description: Establishment of National Leadership Development Institute

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: The overall objective of the project is to create leadership capacity that would provide strategic direction towards realisation of the country's development goals. The project aims at preparing the desired future for modelling a new generation of highly trained civil servants and qualified public administration professionals, as well as achieving capacity building in the areas of professional training, with a particular attention on service delivery and decentralisation processes.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Leadership Development Institu
